universum.studios.android.officium.event

Class SimpleEventBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.officium.event.SimpleEventBus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventBus
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UiEventBus

    public class SimpleEventBus
extends Object
implements EventBus
    An EventBus implementation that wraps Bus provided by the Otto library. Simple bus need to be created with an instance of Otto's bus via SimpleEventBus(Bus). The wrapped bus may be than obtained via getBus() if needed.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky
